title:
Quiver description of Cherkis bow varieties and Nakajima quiver
  varieties
abstract:
We provide a quiver description for Cherkis bow varieties in arbitrary type.
We explain how this generalizes the construction of Nakajima quiver varieties.
We give criteria for stability, non-emptiness, smoothness and discuss
deformations. In the appendix, we discuss the relation between the quiver
description and the original Cherkis' construction of bow varieties.
